colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES BLA MA RTA MGRIN GYI RNAL 'BYOR GYIS DAL 'BYOR LA SNYING PO LEN TSUL SKAL LDAN SNYING NOR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GIS GZHON DUS RTA MGRIN GYI DBANG CHEN THOB PHYIN MOS 'DUN TZAM GYIS BSGOM BZLAS 'DI LTA BUR 'DON 'BUL BA'I YIN PAS, ,RGAS DUS RANG GI BRJED BYANG DANG MOS LDAN GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA'I LAM DU 'GYUR RAM SNYAM NAS, ^ BLA RGAN BHU SU GU PA ZHIG GIS DPAL RI DGE RGYAS KYI BSTI GNAS BRAG SER KHROD DU BRIS PA RNAM KUN BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
